DOC.brief_summary: Assessing the efficacy of Naltrexone as augmentation to SSRI in patients with OCD
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of Naltrexone Treatment as Augmentation to SSRI in OCD Patients
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of OCD Treatment with SSRI for at least 10 weeks with no response Suffering from any medical condition treatment with opiates chronic use of drugs Hepatitis or other liver related diseases Incapability to sign an informed consent
